name: Flora Source Multi Probiotic Capsules
short_description: <style type="text/css"><!--.New1211CatTop	{font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;	font-size:15px;	color:#333;	padding-top:25px;	padding-right:15px;	padding-bottom:30px;	padding-left:15px;	line-height:17px}.New1211CatTop h1	{	background-color:transparent!
description:
Nutri-Health Flora Source

Reduce Embarrassing Gas, Bloating and Constipation

Flora Source features 16 strains of active, friendly bacteria plus scFOS® prebiotic fiber. Each daily dose (two capsules) of this gut-healthy probiotic formula gives you 32 billion colony forming units of the most powerful strains available.

How will Flora Source benefit your health?

Delivering friendly bacteria to your gut helps restore healthy balance to your digestive system and keep it running smoothly. The broad spectrum of strains of probiotics found in Flora Source work together for advanced performance…

  • Supports regular bowel movements
  • Promotes good digestion and colon health
  • Reduces gas and flatulence
  • Decreases instances of constipation
  • Protects healthy bacteria when taking antibiotics
  • Eases gurgling and regurgitation
  • Improves nausea symptoms

Why choose Flora Source?

Flora Source includes a powerhouse strain of friendly bacteria you won’t find in most commercially-available formulas.

Bif Relief 24-7™ (Bifidobacterium lactis HN019) is the first probiotic strain to be tested in humans shown to be effective in relieving the seven most common digestive problems: constipation, irregular bowel movements, flatulence, regurgitation, abdominal pain, nausea and a gurgling gut.

In Flora Source, you get Bif Relief, plus 15 carefully selected probiotic strains, and scFOS® prebiotic fiber to help nourish and strengthen the probiotics.

The breakthrough ingredients in Flora Source are specially encapsulated with the patented Matrix Encapsulation process, which protects them from stomach acid en route to your intestines, where they’re needed most.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: TruBone Complete - New!
short_description:
NEW -  TruBone Complete - a Breakthrough in Bone Health!

Experience the NEW Breakthrough in Bone Health! TruBone Complete™ combines clinically researc
description:
NEW -  TruBone Complete - a Breakthrough in Bone Health!

Experience the NEW Breakthrough in Bone Health! TruBone Complete™ combines clinically researched ingredients to strengthen your bones from the inside out.

  • Stimulates bone growth and slows down bone loss
  • Maximizes benefits of dietary calcium
  • Is an easy to take, non-calcium, one-a-day capsule

 

Why Try TruBone Complete?

During the aging process, bones naturally become thinner and more brittle. Old bone is broken down faster than your body can make new bone. And now we know why…

Bone health isn’t just about shoring up the outer bone with calcium. It’s about actually creating new bone – from the inside out. But no calcium supplement will do that.


TruBone Complete helps preserve and widen the surface of inner bone to…

  • Boost bone-building Osteoblast cells by up to a whopping 20% 
  • Promote collagen production so calcium sticks to your bones – providing a "whole bone" solution that strengthens and supports both inner and outer bone
  • Create new, healthy, youthfully strong and flexible bones the only way possible – from the inside out!


Make TruBone Complete™ an integral part of your daily bone health program including calcium-rich foods, exercise and supplementation.

NH-D3 Cellular Health Support* is your choice for a daily health formula!

  • Promotes joint, muscle, brain & immune health
  • Support healthy mood


NH-D3 is a "fully active" supplement with no inactive fillers, featuring:

  • Swiss-sourced Vitamin D3 and
  • scFOS® prebiotics

 

Research suggests that healthy levels of Vitamin D3 (in the form of cholecalciferol) may support the body at the cellular level to maintain heart, joint, bone and muscle health, promote a healthy mood, and support a normal, healthy immune response.

 

Suggested Use: Adults take up to 2 capsules daily following a meal.

name: Flora Source Multi Probiotic Powder
short_description:
Why Multi-Strain Probiotic Supplements?

Many probiotic cultures are n
description:
Why Multi-Strain Probiotic Supplements?

Many probiotic cultures are needed to support good health. You take a multi-vitamin and mineral supplement every day because your body needs all its vitamins and minerals. Take daily multi-strain probiotic supplements for the same reason: your body needs more than just a few cultures to stay healthy!

Flora Source® Multi-Probiotic® formulas contain 16 probiotics and 32 billion CFU (colony forming units, also called cells or active cultures) per serving*. The digestive tract normally has 400-500 cultures and trillions of cells.

Multi-strain probiotic supplements have been shown to be more effective to maintain good health and more closely duplicate the normal intestinal ecology than single probiotic cultures. Lactobacilli probiotic strains primarily work in the small intestine to aid digestion and absorption. Bifidobacteria strains work in the large intestine to detoxify the colon and assist normal elimination. A variety of both Lactobacilli and Bifidobacteria strains is optimal.

(Timmerman E, et al. Monostrain, multistrain and multispecies probiotics: a comparison of functionality and efficacy. International Journal of Food Microbiology. 2004 Nov 15;96(3):219-33)

Flora Source® Multi-Probiotic® Powder - your premium daily probiotic formula!

Now with Exclusive Bif Relief 24/7 Strain!

Flora Source has just been improved with the new Bif Relief 24/7™, giving you the most potent help available for the seven most common, stubborn digestive worries:

1. Constipation

2. Irregular bowel movements

3. Abdominal pain

4. Nausea

5. Gas and flatulence

6. Gurgling

7. Regurgitation

Top global probiotic scientists screened more than 2,000 potential probiotics in vitro, and decided to move forward with research on Bif Relief only. The resulting clinical studies confirmed Bif Relief was the most effective at significantly improving these nagging sources of digestive discomfort. And it delivered big improvements in an average of two short weeks!

The same scientists also learned that Bif Relief made an incredible difference in speeding up bowel movements and improving regularity. Their tests revealed that taking Bif Relief helped stool move through the bowel 20 hours faster — that’s 33% better than the average “colon transit time” without Bif Relief. This means Flora Source now promotes even more regular bowel movements for a cleaner, healthier colon.

Flora Source still contains 16 probiotics working together to give you broad coverage for a variety of digestive concerns — significantly more than the 2 or 3 found in many other formulas. You’ll only find this exclusive combination of probiotics — including Bif Relief — in Flora Source. And each capsule contains 16 billion active cultures, delivering a hefty 32 billion per daily serving.*

Plus, the probiotics in Flora Source are composed of advanced cells that are resistant to stomach acid and bile, and the patented Matrix Encapsulation process protects them en route to your digestive tract — so they remain intact and ready to work where they’re needed. And it has scFOS® prebiotic fiber to help nourish and strengthen the probiotics!

Suggested Use: Adults take 2/3 teaspoon daily. May be increased to 1 1/3 teaspoons daily. Mix in unheated liquids or sprinkle on room-temperature food.

Powder: 2.1 ounces (60g)

*At time of manufacture

name: D-Ribose Gold™ Muscle & Energy Support
short_description: Your heart, muscles, and every other cell in your body require substantial amounts of energy to keep going stro
description:
Your heart, muscles, and every other cell in your body require substantial amounts of energy to keep going strong. One of the critical components of energy production is ATP (adenosine triphosphate), which acts as the major “current” of energy in the body.

But aging, strenuous exercise, over-exertion, and other conditions can drain ATP from your tissue and cells, and affect how well your body makes and uses energy.

D-Ribose Gold Muscle & Energy Support contains pure D-ribose, a safe and clinically proven carbohydrate that actually helps your body make more ATP in order to spark energy production. This means improved cardiac function and more all-day, total-body stamina so you can stay active, and keep doing the things you love.

D-Ribose Gold restores your body's core energy and keeps it fully charged. Every day muscle stiffness, soreness and fatigue are reduced through this clinically proven formula.

Suggested Use: Adults take 2 teaspoons (1 scoop) twice daily, with morning and evening meals, or as directed by a physician. Product may be mixed into a beverage.

9.9 ounces (280g) Powder, 56 servings

name: FloraZyme Digestive Aid
short_description: If you’re looking for a simple, yet comprehensive solution to a wide range
description:
If you’re looking for a simple, yet comprehensive solution to a wide range of digestion complaints, you’ve found it in FloraZyme Digestive Aid. This exclusive formula combines powerful probiotics and a wide variety of specific digestive enzymes, all in one convenient capsule.

Together, these digestive partners support absorption of precious nutrients from the foods and supplements in your diet, alleviate digestive discomfort – especially just after mealtime – and promote the lifelong health of your digestive tract.

This integrated formula supports digestion in the stomach, small intestine and large intestine with a powerful blend of 18 vegetarian digestive enzymes and five specialized probiotic strains at 5 billion active cells per serving* – plus scFOS® non-gas forming prebiotic fiber for complete digestive health support.

Suggested Use: Take one capsule three times daily, preferably with a meal.

90 Vegetarian Capsules

*At time of manufacture

name: Glucoprotect 6X Blood Sugar Control Supplements
short_description:
Regain Glucose Control with Today’s Most Potent Sugar-Busters 

Now you can take control of your bl
description:
Regain Glucose Control with Today’s Most Potent Sugar-Busters 

Now you can take control of your blood glucose numbers with our potent blend of scientifically proven sugar-busters. GlucoProtect 6X is a powerful formula that works with your body to help maintain naturally healthy blood sugar levels and support appropriate insulin response.

One of the key in ingredients in GlucoProtect 6X is an exciting new Swiss discovery that takes blood glucose management to an entirely new level. It’s called Portusana™, an extract of Purslane that offers triple-mode protection against sugar highs and crashes.

This amazing extract works so well that, in a groundbreaking pilot study, subjects with the highest levels of blood sugar were able to DROP SUGAR LEVELS BY NEARLY 70% in a little over one month!

In a double-blind follow-up study, the results were just as astonishing:

•  HbA1c levels improved by almost 80% in patients after just 6 weeks.
•  Blood sugar returned to normal range in 12 weeks.
•  And Portusana outperformed the placebo by 44%!

Experience the ENERGY AND FOCUS that comes with Healthy Glucose Metabolism

If your blood sugar is rising and ebbing, your body will react to it. One minute you’ll have energy to burn. The next you’ll feel tired, unfocused and hazy. The key is to stop these sugar swings before they happen so you can feel strong, alert and energetic all day long.

The impressive ingredients in GlucoProtect 6X support healthy metabolism to help you avoid those sugar highs and lows.

Milk thistle extract helps your liver release glucose into your bloodstream as needed. When your liver isn’t functioning properly it can cause wild fluctuations in your blood sugar levels… triggering those spikes and crashes that leave you feeling hungry, tired and confused. Healthy liver function is necessary to maintain normal, stable blood sugar levels.

Chromium helps you absorb energy from foods and stabilizes the level of energy you have throughout the day. In a double-blind, placebo controlled study, participants taking 600 mcg of chromium – the same amount in GlucoProtect 6X – showed significant improvements compared to placebo. They had less appetite, fewer cravings for carbohydrates and sweets, and reduced overeating.

Biotin works hand-in-hand with chromium to reduce HbA1c levels. In one study, 600 mcg of chromium combined with 2 mg of biotin levels helped drop fasting glucose 14 times more than placebo. Additionally, HbA1c was reduced by 60% when compared to placebo.

GlucoPhenol is a powerful fruit blend filled with antioxidants and polyphenols. This scientifically backed combination of strawberry and cranberry supports stable blood sugar levels and normal metabolic function.

Together, the nutrients in GlucoProtect 6X:

•  Help maintain steady, normal blood glucose levels
•  Support normal hemoglobin A1C levels
•  Reduce carb cravings and support stable energy, appetite and mood
•  Protect key cells from excess glucose exposure
•  Promote healthy insulin response

GlucoProtect 6X™ may also positively support cognitive and mood health, hunger and metabolism, and energy.

Suggested Use: Adults take 3 capsules daily.

90 Capsules

sugar, blood sugar, glucose, portusana, purslane, extract, blood sugar levels, crashes, insulin

name: 100% New Zealand Colostrum Capsules
short_description:
Why Colostrum?

Recent studies have supported the beneficial effects of bovine colostrum, which is identical in molecular struc
description:
Why Colostrum?

Recent studies have supported the beneficial effects of bovine colostrum, which is identical in molecular structure to the nutrient-rich colostrum in humans.

Colostrum has been shown to:

•  Support intestinal health
•  Promote the body's ability to burn fat and increase muscle
•  Promote normal, natural healing of injuries
•  Increase energy levels
•  Support a healthy immune response

Why New Zealand Colostrum?

Colostrum is "the first food of life" and New Zealand colostrum is known for its purity and effectiveness.

New Zealand colostrum herds are pasture-fed and are raised without the use of hormones, pesticides or antibiotics.

Suggested Use: Adults take 2 capsules twice daily.

Advanced Use: Take 4 capsules twice daily, 30-45 minutes before exercise.

120 Vegetarian Capsules

name: Advanced Cell Rescue
short_description: <style type="text/css"><!--.New1211CatTop	{font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;	font-size:15px;	color:#333;	padding-top:25px;	padding-right:15px;	padding-bottom:30px;	padding-left:15px;	line-height:17px}.New1211CatTop h1	{	background-color:transparent!
description:
Nutri-Health Advanced Cell Rescue

Enjoy a Sharper Mind & More Energy

As we get older, it's not uncommon to feel a frustrating drop in energy levels. That's because our body's production of its natural "energy factories"—or mitochondria—goes way down. Without mitochondria, our cells have no energy... no power to perform their many tasks. Advanced Cell Rescue key ingredient is PQQ which gives your body what it needs to make new mitochondria... new "energy factories."

How will Advanced Cell Rescue benefit your health?

While each ingredient in Advanced Cell Rescue provides extraordinary benefits on their own, it's their combined effect that delivers the real longevity power. When you take Advanced Cell Rescue daily you'll have…

  • Sharper thinking, improved memory, and better focus
  • More pep in your step and a new zest for living
  • Smoother, healthier, younger looking skin

Why choose Advanced Cell Rescue?

The key ingredient in Advanced Cell Rescue is PQQ (short for pyrroloquinoline quinone), which stimulates the creation of mitochondria. PQQ is a highly potent antioxidant that protects you against oxidative aging. That means your heart, kidneys, brain, and every cell in your body feels younger.

Advanced Cell Rescue also helps create your mitochondria's natural bodyguard, the super-antioxidant glutathione, so all your new "energy factories" can run at peak efficiency without interference.

Glutathione is perhaps the most important antioxidant in the world. This powerhouse increases nitric oxide, which supports healthy arteries, blood pressure, and healthy muscle function. It also protects your eyes, your blood glucose balance, your brain and all your 100 trillion cells that make your up body.

However, glutathione is hardly ever used in supplement formulas because of absorption issues. Advanced Cell Rescue solves that problem by using the building blocks of glutathione—N-Acetyl-Cysteine (NAC) and Glycine—to help your body rev up production naturally.

Finally, Advanced Cell Rescue includes astaxanthin help promote younger-looking skin.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Advanced-Q CoQ10 with VESIsorb®
short_description: <style type="text/css">.New1211CatTop {	font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;	font-size: 15px;	color: #333;	padding-top: 25px;	padding-right: 15px;	padding-bottom: 30px;	padding-left: 15px;	line-height: 17px;}.New1211CatTop h1 {	background-color:tran
description:
Advanced-Q CoQ10 with VESIsorb®

Brings you an advanced form of Coenzyme Q10 (Ubiquinol) in a patented delivery technology for enhanced absorption for energy and cardiovascular support.

New Advanced-Q is an exciting breakthrough in CoQ10 supplements, because it uses a state-of-the-art delivery system to overcome this problem and maximize your CoQ10 absorption. This helps more CoQ10 get to where it’s needed – the vital cells in your heart, brain, eyes, liver, and nearly every important system throughout your body.

In fact, Advanced-Q was found to be six times more absorbable than other standard CoQ10 (unbiquinone) preparations.

Patented VESIsorb® technology turns large CoQ10 molecules into easily absorbed "nanoparticles." The VESIsorb process works by breaking down the Ubiquinol in Advanced-Q to extremely tiny particles, which are suspended in liquid. These “nanoparticles” are small enough to pass through your small intestine and into your bloodstream at a much higher rate than most traditional CoQ10 preparations, so you absorb and use more. Plus, Advanced-Q comes in an innovative two-piece Caplique®, which features an airtight band that seals the capsule and shields the CoQ10 inside from oxidative damage.

As we age, we make less CoQ10 and it becomes harder for our bodies to naturally convert the basic ubiquinone form to ubiquinol, which research suggests is so important for combating oxidative stress. Advanced-Q contains CoQ10 in the Ubiquinol form, which provides superior support for a healthy heart, brain, nervous system, liver, and blood sugar balance. Plus, Ubiquinol CoQ10 is the best “spark plug” for helping our bodies make energy at the cellular level – for a difference you can actually feel!

Advanced-Q is the best way to get every bit of benefit from your CoQ10 supplement – for energy you’ll feel today, and head-to-toe protection you’ll be thankful for tomorrow.

Suggested Use: Adults take 1 Caplique®* daily, preferably with a meal.

30 Caplique Capsules

* A Caplique® is a liquid-filled, 2 piece capsule sealed with a band.

name: ArthroZyme Joint & Muscle
short_description: ArthroZyme Joint & Muscle doesn't just mask your joint symptoms - it gets to the source of your trouble, so you finally get lasting relief fr
description:
ArthroZyme Joint & Muscle doesn't just mask your joint symptoms - it gets to the source of your trouble, so you finally get lasting relief from the everyday aches and stiffness that prevent you from moving through your day with effortless comfort you once enjoyed.

ArthroZyme attacks the build-up of fibrin, a form of harmful protein debris that can collect at various points throughout the body - particularly joints. Excess fibrin can harden tissue, which restricts movement and heightens joint inflammation and discomfort.

ArthroZyme Joint & Muscle features one of the most powerful, natural fibrin-busting ingredients available -Serratiopeptidase (or "SP" for short). SP is a powerful systemic enzyme first discovered in the silkworm. Now synthesized into a natural supplement form, SP helps break up protein-based fibrin throughout the body so it can be safely ushered away, restoring your body's healthy inflammation response and bringing soothing comfort to your aching joints.

Plus, the SP in ArthroZyme is independently tested for purity and potency; each tablet is enteric coated to resist stomach acid. This helps ArthroZyme travel safely to the small intestine for maximum absorption and effectiveness!

What's in ArthroZyme?

The product is formulated at the optimum dosage of 10 mg per tablet (20,000 IU) and is enteric coated for maximum effectiveness. Nutri-Health® scientists obtain the purest, most effective form of serratiopeptidase available which is independently tested for purity and potency.

Suggested Use: Adults take up to 3 tablets daily on an empty stomach.

90 Tablets

Serratiopeptidase, natural joint relief, natural muscle pain relief, ArthoZyme Plus, joint relief, joint discomfort, knee pain, elbows, hip pain, hips, complete joint solution, Serrapeptase

name: ArthroZyme Plus Joint & Muscle
short_description: <style type="text/css"><!--.New1211CatTop	{font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;	font-size:15px;	color:#333;	padding-top:25px;	padding-right:15px;	padding-bottom:30px;	padding-left:15px;	line-height:17px}.New1211CatTop h1	{	background-color:transparent!
description:
Nutri-Health AthroZyme Plus

Get to the Root of Joint and Muscle Pain for Fast Relief

ArthroZyme Plus isn't your "ordinary joint health formula". This incredibly fast-acting formula will turn down the enzymes that cause pain... shield your cartilage from destruction and target inflammation at its source.

How will ArthroZyme Plus benefit your health?

ArthroZyme Plus is specifically designed to zero in on the exact causes of pain and neutralize them at the source. Better yet, it doesn't take months to kick into action. The powerful ingredients in ArthroZyme Plus start working in a matter of days to:

  • Reduce inflammation and stiffness
  • Shut down the enzyme destroying your cartilage
  • Switch off your pain triggers
  • Increase flexibility, mobility and healthy joint movement

Why choose ArthroZyme Plus?

What makes ArthroZyme Plus so powerful is the scientifically proven ingredients—at research dosages—that work inside your body to quickly reduce factors related to pain.

In ArthroZyme Plus we use a unique form of boswellia called Boxwellia 10X (5-LOXIN) that is a ten-times concentrated form of the most active pain-fighting boswellic acid available. That means it works ten times harder than other boswellia extracts to zero in on two major sources of pain and inflammation.

In addition, ArthroZyme Plus includes:

  • Serratiopeptidase to help reduce pain, swelling and inflammation in joints
  • Bromelain to minimize inflammation and improve stiffness and mobility
  • Vitamin D3 to boost your protection against the loss of cartilage
  • Zinc for greater muscle comfort and flexibility

Once you start taking ArthroZyme Plus you'll be surprised at how much easier it will be to join friends for an active night out on the town, spend time playing with the grandkids or get back into your favorite sport. Dance, play, run! It's your life and you CAN live it the way you want.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

description:
Nutri-Health BG-Cor Advanced Heart Health

Promote Normal Cholesterol and Triglyceride Levels

BG-Cor™ Advanced Heart Health is one of the first supplement formulas to provide "triple barrel," synergistic support for your heart. Not only have BG-Cor's natural ingredients been shown to balance LDL cholesterol levels, the research also indicates they can help increase levels of beneficial HDL cholesterol, and promote healthy triglycerides.

How will BG-Cor benefit your health?

BG-Cor features a highly standardized Bergamot citrus fruit extract, called Bergamonte®, which has been clinically shown to:

  • Lower total and LDL cholesterol levels
  • Raise "good" HDL cholesterol levels
  • Support healthy triglyceride levels
  • Decrease blood sugar levels

Why choose BG-Cor?

BG-Cor is one of the first supplement formulas to provide this kind of synergistic support for your heart health. By addressing all these critical issues, BG-Cor is a true breakthrough in natural cholesterol formulas.

BG-Cor gives you the research dose of 500 mg of Bergamonte plus 1.3 g of phytosterols. Research shows that foods or supplements providing at least 500mg of phytosterols eaten along with meals and snacks for a total daily intake of 2g and as part of a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol may reduce the risk of heart disease.

Even if you don't have a "heart problem," but a family history has you concerned about your cholesterol, put BG-Cor to work for you. BG-Cor can help stop the worrying because finally you can do something to lower your numbers now and keep them in the normal range for years to come.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Bi-Optium Eye Health
short_description: Protect Your Sight for Life-Long Independence
description:
Protect Your Sight for Life-Long Independence

Bi-Optium: Super Nutrition for Your Eyes

Now there is a natural way to give your eyes all of the support they need. It’s called Bi-Optium, a powerhouse blend of 10 “must-have” nutrients and antioxidants that target your eyes. The carefully selected combination of lutein, zeaxanthin, astaxanthin and powerful mineral chelates work together to promote healthy eye maintenance.

•  Relieve your eyes of daily soreness, fatigue and strain
•  Improve contrast and blurriness
•  Promote better glare tolerance
•  Support macular and retinal health
•  Improve oxygen flow to your eyes and blood vessels
•  Destroy and dispose of harmful free radicals
•  Support normal vision and healthy eyes as you age

Lutein and Zeaxanthin: The Dynamic Duo for Clearer Vision

The National Institute of Health is currently conducting a study on two of the key ingredients in Bi-Optium. In the second Age-Related Eye Study of its kind (AREDS2,) researchers are studying the effects of 10 mg. of lutein and 2 mg. of zeaxanthin on eye health. This is the same daily dosage found in 2 Bi-Optium capsules.

These powerful antioxidants are concentrated in the macular pigment of your eyes where they help filter harmful blue light from damaging your cells. By limiting the amount of blue light that enters the eye, lutein and zeaxanthin act like “internal sunglasses” that protect against free radical damage and keep your eyesight clear and focused.

Additional research shows that lutein and zeaxanthin promote better glare tolerance, reduce visual stress and support your macula. Lutein was also found to improve visual performance in low light conditions.

Astaxanthin: The Emerging Superstar in Eye Support

Astaxanthin is now emerging as another valuable antioxidant that safeguards your eyes from oxidative stress and damage which can result in eye fatigue, straining and blurring. Its unique molecular structure helps it easily enter the cells of the retina where it can do the most good. 

In fact, a number of studies have shown that this mighty antioxidant is more than ten times as potent as beta-carotene in scavenging oxygen free radicals.

Targeted Nutrition to Protect Your Eyesight

The antioxidant carotenoids lutein, zeaxanthin and astaxanthin are powerful on their own. But we’ve added even more strength to Bi-Optium™ Eye Health. It contains other eye-healthy nutrients often overlooked in other formulas, including B vitamins, and vitamins C and E.

Together, the eye critical nutrients in Bi-Optium support every part of your eyes and their surrounding “support systems.” This includes your maculas, retinas, lenses, and blood vessels — to give you a lifetime of healthy vision.

Suggested Use: Adults take 1 capsule with breakfast and 1 capsule with lunch.

60 Vegetarian Capsules

short_description: <style type="text/css"><!--.New1211CatTop	{font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;	font-size:15px;	color:#333;	padding-top:25px;	padding-right:15px;	padding-bottom:30px;	padding-left:15px;	line-height:17px}.New1211CatTop h1	{	background-color:transparent!
description:
Nutri-Health Flora Sinus

Do you have Nasal Congestion and Sinus Pressure?

The secret to breaking down nasal congestion is to support healthy mucus secretion. This means attacking stubborn sinus problems at their source. The clinically proven ingredients in Flora Sinus do just that by offering a dual-action solution aimed at stopping nasal irritation, inflammation and congestion in their tracks.

How will Flora Sinus benefit your health?

The combination of proven ingredients in Flora Sinus work in harmony to…

  • Relieve nasal congestion so you can breathe easier
  • Improve mucus flow and flush out unhealthy nasal irritants
  • Ease head-pounding sinus pressure
  • Get rid of hard, dried up mucus that causes inflammation
  • Reduce drainage and phlegm in the back of the throat
  • Boost healthy flora in sinuses
  • Promote healthy immune response

Why choose Flora Sinus?

Flora Sinus includes one of the most potent mucus-busters available—a powerful antioxidant known as N-Acetyl Cysteine (NAC). This amino acid is widely recognized as both an immune-booster and a mucus-thinning agent. In fact, it’s so effective at clearing up your sinuses that when researchers tested it out, it started working within one hour to break down nose-clogging mucus. And it was still working four hours later.

Once mucus starts flowing naturally it helps flush out harmful irritants, reduce nasal congestion and relieve sinus pressure.

Flora Sinus also includes four sinus-specific probiotics inspired by groundbreaking research out of Switzerland. In a landmark 2003 study Swiss scientists showed these four probiotics—the same ones found in Flora Sinus—support a healthy balance of friendly bacteria and in the nose. At the same time, they reduce unhealthy irritants that can worsen sinus conditions and lower your immune response.

Don’t suffer another minute of sinus congestion and pounding pressure. Target the source of your nasal misery with Flora Sinus.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: FloraBright Oral Probiotics
short_description: <style type="text/css"><!--.New1211CatTop	{font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;	font-size:15px;	color:#333;	padding-top:25px;	padding-right:15px;	padding-bottom:30px;	padding-left:15px;	line-height:17px}.New1211CatTop h1	{	background-color:transparent!
description:
Nutri-Health FloraBright

Whiter Teeth, Fresh Breath, and Better Oral Health

FloraBright contains an award winning combination of natural oral probiotics that work together to support and protect healthy teeth, shield against gum problems and bad breath, and gently restore your smile from dull and yellow to bright and white.

How will FloraBright benefit your health?

In just seconds, FloraBright goes to work to create a perfectly healthy mouth, and gives you:

  • A beautiful, confident smile
  • Strong, healthy teeth and gums
  • Fresh, clean breath that lasts
  • Whiteness that comes naturally—not from harsh scraping or chemicals

 

Why choose FloraBright?

Inside your mouth, bad bacteria convert sugar and other carbohydrates to lactic acid—or “cavity fuel” —that also wears away at your teeth’s delicate enamel.

Together, the three specialized probiotic strains in FloraBright work to beat back this cavity-creating process, and naturally protect your teeth and gums.

The S. rattus JH145 strain in FloraBright keeps your teeth naturally strong and healthy. In one clinical study it was shown to decrease harmful bacteria by as much as 85%.

The other two strains in FloraBright—S. oralis and S. uberis—create microscopic levels of hydrogen peroxide which not only inhibit the growth of bad bacteria that can harm your teeth and gums, but also help freshen your breath and keep your teeth noticeably whiter too!

Enjoy a single FloraBright mint each day, and you’ll have something no other mint, gum or mouthwash can give you…a healthy balance of oral flora, to keep you looking and feeling great, and protection for your teeth and gums all day long!

FloraBright contains no harsh bleaching agents and no artificial ingredients. Each spearmint-vanilla flavored mint is sweetened with xylitol, to promote healthier teeth. Xylitol is a natural sugar substitute that helps prevent bacteria from sticking to your teeth.

FloraBright is beneficial for both adults and children as a part of a daily oral hygiene routine and is safe for your teeth, gums, veneers, caps and even dentures.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Memoril Memory & Mood
short_description:
Experience this Amazing 60-Minute Brain Booster that LASTS FOR HOURS

Do you randomly forget thing
description:
Experience this Amazing 60-Minute Brain Booster that LASTS FOR HOURS

Do you randomly forget things... like the phone number that was on the tip of your tongue two seconds ago or the name of the new co-worker you were just introduced to? And how crazy is it when you misplace the tool you just had in your hand or spend an hour look for the pair of sunglasses that are sitting on top of your head?

Thank goodness for Memoril!

Memoril is a fast-acting brain-booster clinically proven to improve focus, memory, attention and mood. It includes three super brain nutrients and starts working in less than one hour. Just take a look at the superstar ingredients you’ll find in Memoril and what they can do for you...

Enhance Your Ability to Focus, Remember and React

Super Brain Booster #1 – Cereboost™. Our unique memory formula features a potent American ginseng extract called Cereboost. In a recent double-blind, placebo-controlled, cross-over clinical study, subjects taking 200 mg daily of Cereboost (the same amount in Memoril) had great results. In as little as one hour, the participants experienced...

•    Improved ability to focus
•    More accurate memory recall
•    Faster reaction time

The results of this study establish that Cereboost™ has a powerful impact on cognitive performance by enhancing both short and long term memory, attention and focus. These dramatic improvements occurred in less than an hour and lasted up to six hours!

Ditch Stress and Anxiety that Affect Your Alertness and Ability to Concentrate

Super Brain Booster #2 – Sensoril®. Symptoms of stress and anxiety can have a negative impact on your memory and concentration. That’s why we added a highly potent form of ashwagandha extract called Sensoril to our formula.

In a randomized, double-blind placebo controlled human clinical trial - the “gold standard” in product efficacy validation - researchers found that the ashwagandha in Sensoril significantly reduced forgetfulness and inability to concentrate.

It also helps with numerous stress factors that may be interfering with your mental function. Subjects taking 250 mg. of Sensoril were able to sleep better, had a reduction in fatigue and less irritability. Additionally, they experienced fewer incidences of headache and muscle pain.

Once you get these symptoms of stress out of the way it’s much easier to maintain a relaxed, focused mood that helps naturally promote better concentration, recall, and mental sharpness.

A Nourished Brain Works Much Better!

Super Brain Booster #3 – Vinpocetine. Increasing blood flow to the brain is essential to keeping your brain healthy and active. That’s because your blood delivers all of the oxygen and nutrients necessary for robust brain and nerve cell functioning. But even during normal aging, blood flow to the brain may decrease by 20%.

Research shows vinpocetine improves blood flow into the brain. This helps protect brain cells from injury which, in turn, may enhance memory, focus and mental clarity.

Don’t settle for a lifetime of forgetfulness, slow responses and dull-thinking. Sharpen your mental energy, boost you concentration and power up your recall ability. Just one dose of Memoril will kick your brain into action in 60 minutes or less... and keep it that way for the next 6 hours.

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily, preferably with a meal.

60 Vegetarian Capsules

Easy to digest and take every day, new Nutri-Daily goes far beyond a run-of-the-mill multivitamin.

Packed with 43 carefully selected "must have" nutrients, it works four ways to give you comprehensive nutritional support so you can stay healthy, vibrant, and energized at age 50 and beyond.

You get optimal forms and potencies of nutrients that are likely to decline in your body as you age, including:

-   Vitamin D in its natural, more effective D3 (cholecalciferol) form.

-   Vitamin B6 and vitamin B12 at higher potencies that you safely take to help reserve hidden deficiencies

-   Vitamin K2, which is crucial for promoting bone health. The natural MK-7 form in Nutri-Daily™ is as much as 10 times better absorbed!

-   Vitamin C, which provides important support for your heart, eyes, cells, and immune system. Nutri-Daily includes a special form of vitamin C called PureWay® C, which is absorbed more easily

... Plus special forms of Calcium, Folic Acid, and Vitamin E ... all n the best form for your body to absorb and use ... even if you have digestive trouble!

Nutri-Daily for Men gives you a powerful Men's Priority Health Formula to help address concerns about prostate and sexual health as you age. You get Korean red ginseng to support sexual vitality, along with zinc to promote normal testosterone levels. Plus you get lycopene and selenium to maintain prostate function and cellular health.

Nutri-Daily also comes in smaller-sized tablets, and features a special EZ-Swallow™ coating so it's pleasant to take every day.

120 tablets

name: pharMAX Nerve Pain Relief Cream
description:
Nutri-Health is proud to offer its customers pharMAX nerve. Pharmax is a trusted brand of Seroyal, our sister company under the Atrium Innovations umbrella. Seroyal offers a comprehensive line of professional grade nutraceuticals products built upon a 15 year research-driven scientific foundation.

pharMAX™ nerve
Temporary relief for symptoms associated with nerve pain and diabetic nerve pain

Developed by leading Canadian Molecular Pharmacologist, Dr. Joseph Gabriele, pharMAX nerve homeopathic pain relief cream combines natural oils and extracts that work synergistically for maximum relief for your nerve pain. In pharMAX nerve, Dr. Gabriele has included:

  • Capsicum (Capsicum annuum L.) 2C for soothing relief from muscle aches with vitamin A, vitamin B6, vitamin E, vitamin C, riboflavin, potassium and manganese.
  • Rutin for powerful antioxidant support and skin conditioning.
  • Acai (Euterpe oleracea) fruit oil, an acclaimed "superfood", with omega-3 fatty acids and antioxidants.
  • Green tea (Camellia sinensis) leaf extract to help fight free radicals with antioxidant polyphenols, catechins and tannins.
  • Lime (Citrus aurantifolia) oil which regulates the calcium channels (nerve channel).

The natural active ingredients in pharMAX nerve, including rutin and its derivatives, have the potential to inhibit 5 pain pathways that help mediate inflammation.

The power of pharMAX nerve comes from delivra™ trans-dermal technology, a proprietary compound base topical delivery system that when combined with medicinal ingredients delivers it deep into the skin’s dermis layer.

In subdermal trials the delivra technology was shown to deliver active ingredients more effectively than a leading competitor. After just one hour, the delivra concentration was 297% higher than the competitor, and 24 hours later it was a whopping 687% higher.

That means the active ingredients penetrate deep into your skin, getting to the areas that need pain relief fast. And, they stay longer, providing more lasting relief than the competition.

pharMAX nerve utilizes the purest natural actives and contains no strong odors. The non-greasy, non-sticky cream goes on smooth and is easily aborbed into the skin. Plus, it’s free of parabens, sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), and petrolatum.

Why a Unique Probiotic for Women?

Women have specific needs for maintaining balanced, healthy microflora in the body. Any imbalance may upset the vaginal, urinary, and digestive tracts. Medication, excess sugar in the diet, stress, and many other lifestyle factors all can trigger this kind of an imbalance.

Probiotics, or beneficial bacteria, can help. A multi-probiotic supplement works synergistically with the natural microflora in the body to support women's health needs, naturally!

Flora Source Multi-Probiotic Women features a specialized blend of 6 powerful probiotics at 30 billion active CFUs (colony-forming units) per serving* for complete feminine health support.

•    Specialized probiotics promote a healthy flora balance for vaginal and urinary tract health.

•    Non-gas forming scFOS® prebiotic fiber nourishes these beneficial probiotics for an optimum daily microflora balance.

name: Probiotics and your Sinus Health - Book
short_description:
Probiotics and your Sinus Health?

Dr. John G. Thomas finds that healthy nasal mucus is essential to proper sinus function. Nasal mucus is loaded with immune cells that wash away harmful micro
description:
Probiotics and your Sinus Health?

Dr. John G. Thomas finds that healthy nasal mucus is essential to proper sinus function. Nasal mucus is loaded with immune cells that wash away harmful microbes before they can make you sick.

"Most of us harbor the assumption that our noses should be dry,” says Dr. John G. Thomas, award-winning microbiologist and author of Probiotics and Your Sinus Health."

"The best health solution is just the opposite: don’t dry up the mucus! Let it flow freely and do its job as a barrier against harmful microbes."

"If your mucus becomes too thick and stagnant, it stays in your sinuses and nasal cavity and becomes a perfect incubator for bacteria, fungi and viruses."

Your booklet includes chapters on:

• Sinus Conditions

• The Power of Probiotics

• The Connection between Sinus and Gut Health

• The Big Four Probiotics for Sinus Health

 

About Professor John G. Thomas

Professor John G. Thomas, PhD, has been a clinical microbiologist for more than 40 years. He integrates four academic and educational positions at West Virginia university, and holds teaching positions at Rutgers University and internationally is a visiting professor at Cardiff University and National University of Singapore.

name: Sleep Wave Rest & Relax
short_description:
Fast-Acting Sleep Wave Targets the Top 6 Reasons You Can’t Sleep

You may have tried one or two of the ingredients in <
description:
Fast-Acting Sleep Wave Targets the Top 6 Reasons You Can’t Sleep

You may have tried one or two of the ingredients in Sleep Wave before... maybe even three or four of them. But it’s probably been a long time since you’ve experienced the deep, relaxing sleep that comes when you combine ALL of the powerful natural sleep aids found in Sleep Wave.

That’s because each natural ingredient in our proprietary formula works to target the factors that might be keeping you awake at night. Add them all together and we’ve covered the bases that may prevent you from getting a sound night’s sleep once you’ve hit the sack, so you experience every stage of sleep, every night – including the beta wave sleep that’s so critical to your overall health and mental sharpness.

1.  Can’t shut down your mind at bedtime? Valerian calms your mind by gently reducing brain activity so you can turn off those mind-racing thoughts and ideas to get a better night’s sleep. And it starts working quickly. In one breakthrough study 89 percent of people slept better on the first night and 44 percent reported “perfect sleep” after just two days.

2.  Don’t feel tired enough to fall asleep? Not a problem. Hops has a relaxing effect that helps you get nice and tired for a long night’s sleep. It naturally calms your nerves and works together with valerian to get you into a sound sleep more quickly.

3.  Feeling nervous about the upcoming day? Don’t worry. We’ve added lemon balm to soothe agitation and stress, chamomile to calm nerves and passion flower to reduce nervous tension. Together these three compounds can release anxiety and worry to help you experience a deep, relaxing sleep that leaves you feeling renewed and refreshed when you wake up in the morning.
 
4.  Too stressed out to even imagine sleeping? That’s why we added L-Theanine and GABA to Sleep Wave. They work hand-in-hand to produce a calming effect that helps reduce stress and balance your brain activity for a better night’s sleep.

5.  Is your sleep schedule all mixed up? Melatonin has the remarkable power to help your body differentiate night from day. If your sleep patterns are out of whack—if you’re burning midnight oil and arriving late to work – taking melatonin at night can re-establish a regular sleep cycle and help you wake up feeling bright and alert at an earlier hour.

6.  Does a bad mood or depression have you tossing and turning? Vitamin B6 can have a significant impact on the levels of serotonin in your brain. This is the “feel good” hormone that balances your mood and keeps you feeling happy. B6 is also vital for the production of melatonin.

The best news of all is that Sleep Wave starts working on the very first night. You may fall asleep in as little as 9 minutes and sleep like a baby until morning light. And we guarantee you won’t experience any grogginess or brain malfunction when you wake up in the morning. Instead you’ll hop out of bed with a fully charged brain and filled with the refreshing energy that follows a good night’s sleep.

Sleep Wave is natural and non-habit forming. So you can take it night after night for a deep, relaxing sleep without harmful side effects.

Suggested Use: Adults take 2 capsules 30-60 minutes before bedtime.

60 Vegetarian Capsules

Not to be taken by pregnant or lactating women.

name: ZymaZorb Digestive Enzymes
short_description:
Why ZymaZorb® Digestive Enzymes?

ZymaZorb® Digestive Enzymes help support
description:
Why ZymaZorb® Digestive Enzymes?

ZymaZorb® Digestive Enzymes help support normal metabolic digestion, nutrient absorption, and regularity.

Unlike other digestive enzyme formulas, ZymaZorb® features 18 vegetarian digestive enzymes that work in the stomach AND small intestine for maximum nutrient breakdown and absorption support.

Get Dual Action Support

Digestion doesn’t just happen in the stomach, so why choose a digestive enzyme supplement that does?

• The stomach is a crucial point for protein and nutrient breakdown! ZymaZorb® features 15 specific digestive enzymes that support the healthy breakdown of proteins, carbohydrates (sugars), and fats in the stomach.

• The small intestine also plays a key role in completing nutrient breakdown and supporting efficient nutrient absorption. ZymaZorb® also features 3 enteric coated enzymes that support protein, fat, and carbohydrate digestion in the small intestine.

• Plus: Some digestive enzyme formulas use animal pancreatin as their enzyme sources. Nutri-Health Supplements uses only 100% vegetarian enzymes for exceptional quality enzyme support. Featuring 100% vegetarian enzymes!

Suggested Use: Take one capsule three times daily, preferably with a meal.

90 Vegetarian Capsules
